#!/usr/bin/python

import os
import sys
from math import log,sqrt,floor

gr=(1+sqrt(5))/2
sq5=sqrt(5)

def fib_index(F):
	return floor(log(F*sq5 + .5, gr))

inp=sys.stdin.readline

while True:
	p = inp().split()
	n1 = int(p[0])
	n2 = int(p[1])
	
	if n1 == 0 and n2 == 0:
		break
	
	print int(fib_index(n2) - fib_index(n1))
